Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

rostemplate (development version)

  • Añade una nueva paleta de colores ros_metro_madrid_pal().

rostemplate 0.2.0

Importante! Configuración mínima en pkgdowm.yaml ha de ser:

template:
  bootstrap: 5
  package: rostemplate

Otros cambios:

  • Adapt to BS5 with new pkgdown version.
  • Documentación en castellano
  • Añade paletas de colores

rostemplate 0.0.4

  • Use testthat package.
  • Rename core functions.
  • Update actions.
  • Update logo and favicons, created with hexSticker.

rostemplate 0.0.3

  • Add ros_badge_ropenspain() :

rostemplate 0.0.2

  • Move to rOpenSpain.

rostemplate 0.0.1

  • First stable release

On this page

About rostemplate

Developed by Diego Hernangómez.

Part of the rOpenSpain project.

About rOpenSpain

rOpenSpain is a community of R enthusiasts whose ultimate goal is to create high-quality R packages for data mining public Spanish open sources.

Site built with pkgdown 2.2.0.

Template rostemplate by dieghernan, based on templatesherpa.com.
